post:
Hello LowEndTalk Community!

We are very excited to be apart of your community and we have come today to offer an exclusive sneak peak at a Black Friday offer. 

Our focus is to provide high-end enterprise hosting & infrastructure at a fraction of the cost in geographically diverse locations all around the word. Our in-house experienced specialists are available 24/7 via Live Chat, Phone, & Ticket Support.  Signup today and enhance your hosting experience with HiFormance!

**Why choose HiFormance?**

* 24/7 Expert Support
* Fully Featured Control Panel
* Custom ISO/Templates 
* 1 Hour Deployment
* Redundant Infrastructure
* KVM & OpenVZ 
* 99.99% Uptime SLA
* Bulk pricing discounts
* Flexible pricing & configurations
* 24/7/365 On-site Technicians

**Locations**

* Buffalo, NY - 107.175.18.3 - [Looking Glass](http://lg.buffalo.ny.hiformance.net/)
* Chicago, IL - 192.3.19.3 - [Looking Glass](http://lg.chicago.il.hiformance.net/)
* Dallas, TX (KVM Only) - 107.173.126.3 - [Looking Glass](http://lg.dallas.tx.hiformance.net/)
* Los Angeles, CA - 107.175.217.3 - [Looking Glass](http://lg.losangeles.ca.hiformance.net/)

**Limited Offer**


OpenVZ - 1 CPU - 0.5GB Ram - 20GB SSD - 1TB BW - 1Gbps - 1IP - $9/year [Order now](https://my.hiformance.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=99)

OpenVZ - 2 CPU - 1GB Ram - 40GB SSD - 2TB BW - 1Gbps - 1IP - $14/year [Order now](https://my.hiformance.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=100)

KVM - 1 CPU - 1GB Ram - 20GB SSD - 2TB BW - 1Gbps - 1IP - $4/mth [Order now](https://my.hiformance.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=101)

KVM - 2 CPU - 2GB Ram - 40GB SSD - 4TB BW - 1Gbps - 1IP - $7/mth [Order now](https://my.hiformance.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=102)
 

Thanks for reading! If you have any questions please don't hesitate to ask :)

Best Regards,

Kyle R  
HiFormance Specialist
